#summary Introduction asd list of sub-projects

This project regroups several Second Life opensource scripts originally written by Jeff Mantel. Most of them are related to [http://code.google.com/p/opencollar/ OpenCollar] or [http://wiki.secondlife.com/wiki/RestrainedLifeAPI RLV].

= Sub-projects =

  * CardGame: an OpenCollar add-on for switches, that can exchange their roles based on cards

More to come ;)

For more details, please check out my [http://sites.google.com/site/jeffmantelsdesigns/ web site].
